```{r}
myvars <- c(totalpop = "B01003_001",
            povertystatus = "B05010_001")
```



```{r}
wa_counties_withgeo <- get_acs(geography = "county",
                       variables = c(myvars),
                       state = "WA",
                       output = "wide",
                       geometry = TRUE)

wa_counties_withgeo
```


```{r}
mapview(wa_counties_withgeo, zcol = "povertystatusE")
```


```{r}
mapview(wa_counties_withgeo, zcol = "povertystatusE", 
         col.regions = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(9, "Reds"), 
         alpha.regions = 1)
```
